Title: Derailed
Writer: Joe Gayton (creator), Tony Gayton (creator), Mark Richard, Bruce Marshall Romans (staff writer)
Actors: Anson Mount, Colm Meaney, Common, Dominique McElligott
Plot: A train is derailed by the Cheyenne. Durant orders Cullen to lead a team to track them. Lily moves out of Durant's coach and into her own tent beside the brothel. Tension mounts for ...
